page.title: 11A HOPPING GAME/3-6 PLAYERS
page.content: {Eggy Peggy This is a game for 3-6 players.One person stands opposite the others and chooses a group of something,ie games, films,names,etc.The other players then choose something in this group,and each whispers it to the person next to her.This goes on to the end of the line,when the last person calls out the choices to the person on the opposite side of the play ground.The person at the other end of the playground chooses one of the games (or other subjects),and calls it out to the other players.The person who chose the particular game that was called out hops into the centre of the playground,and so does the person on the other side of the playground.They nudge each other gently,while still hopping,and the first person to stand on 2 feet loses the game.
